textAfterTable: Women's Pants Inseam INSEAM Short Regular Long Length 29" 32" 34" WOMEN'S FIT INFO and DESCRIPTIONS FIT INFORMATION • Trim Fit - Fits close to the body. • Regular Fit - Shaped to skim the body. • Relaxed Fit - More generous cut, designed to sit away from the body. * check the product description features and specifications for the fit of a Royal Robbins item BOTTOM RISE • Contemporary Rise - Rests three fingers below the navel. • Classic Rise - Rests one finger below the navel. INSEAMS (measured from the crotch to the bottom of the garment) • Short Shorts - 5 - 9" • Bermuda Shorts - 11 - 12" • Knickers - 15 - 16" • Capris - 19 - 25" • Ankle Length - 29 - 30" • Pants (regular) - 32" SLEEVE LENGTHS (measured from the center back) • Cap Sleeve - 12 - 13" • Short Sleeve - 13 - 15" • Elbow Sleeve - 20 - 21" • 3/4 Sleeve -
